Title: Prohibits the addition or change to certain wage orders which would have the effect of requiring an employer to pay an employee for time not actually worked
Summary: Prohibits the addition or change to certain wage orders which would have the effect of requiring an employer to pay an employee for time not actually worked.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to prohibiting the addition or change to certain wage orders which would have the effect of requiring an employer to pay an employee for time not actually worked
